collection.sentence:
This Privacy Policy explains how we
collect, use, and share your information when you visit our website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
## Information We Collect

We collect the following information when you visit our website:

  * Your IP address
  * Browser type and language
  * Referring website
  * Pages you visit on our website
  * Date and time of your visit
  * Information you provide to us through forms, such as your name and email address

We also collect information from cookies and other tracking technologies.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
They
allow us to remember your preferences and settings, and to track your activity
on our website.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
## Your Choices

You have the following choices regarding your information:

  * You can choose not to allow us to collect cookies by disabling cookies in your browser settings.
